website_summaries.verdict: Classic timepiece with 3 hands, this offers low-key style and function.
pros: Calfskin leather straps are interchangeable with other 14mm straps
There's also a discreet window that displays the date
cons: Strap runs large, so those with small wrists may need to punch extra holes

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! It's very suitable for my wrist size. I'm usually worried about having a watch face that is obnoxiously giant on me but this is really perfect. The mother of pearl face is super subtle but has beautiful colors and I love the concentric circles on the face. The band is comfortable and setting the time and date were really easy. Please ignore my giant veins. 🙃
customer_reviews.author: Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and classic watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is stunning! The dark blue face is reminiscent of a night sky and the rose gold details are the perfect accent for it. The leather band blends with the rose gold and I love that it has the silver details as well for the buckle and where the band attaches to the watch. I needed a nice, simple watch with a sweeping second hand and this is perfect, the date on the watch face is an added bonus. Excellent classic, simple, and unique two toned watch.
customer_reviews.author: LJTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Keep Time!!!
customer_reviews.text: This one is headed back to Amazon. It was dead when it was delivered and went out and bought batteries for it. When I installed the batteries it went crazy. Something is suddenly very wrong with Fossil SmartWatches. I switched to Fossil because of the battery leakage issue on FitBits and now I guess I will just find me a cheap watch at Walmart and not enjoy technology!
customer_reviews.author: Enlightened Soul

customer_reviews.title: Even better looking in person!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Strap is slightly long, which shifts the face of the watch. However, I have small wrists so that could be why. Overall, I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: bbtone000

customer_reviews.title: Band turned black
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this watch maybe 8 times and the band has turned blackish, it looks terrible. I'm 5 days past the eligible time for the 30 day return.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product at all. I bought this for our daughter for Christmas. Its is beautiful but it does not work. It arrived with out a battery, we took it to our local jeweler and he put a battery in it. It did start working, and then stopped with in 24 hours. I have contacted this seller through Amazon and have not received a response and that was several weeks ago. My experience with this seller obviously has been a horrible one.
customer_reviews.author: zoe324

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I got so tired of pulling my phone out to check the time that I decided to go back to a wrist watch after several years without one. I’m loving this watch so far. It’s got a slightly thinner band than I would like but the face is the perfect size. And the thickness of it is very nice. North too chunky or heavy. The pin was really hard to get out to adjust the time but other then that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: AuntieB

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed with this watch. It looks beautiful in the listing and it was beautiful...until I wore it. The listing describes the band as "genuine leather," which it is, however it's suede leather. Had I know it was actually suede, I wouldn't have purchased it. The pretty, pale pink band was filthy and dingy looking almost immediately and suede is almost impossible to clean. I have tried all recommended cleaning methods and nothing has been overly successful. I still wear the watch because the watch face is gorgeous and I just hope that no one actually notices the grimy wristband. Would not buy again, nor do I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: I love Fossil as a whole
customer_reviews.text: I love Fossil as a whole. I have a lot of bags, wallets, clutches, watches, and jewelry from this brand. This review is mostly for the seller itself though, as my watch arrived in new wrapping, but was ticking, which was a total bummer. Who knows how long I'll have until I need to change the battery. The strap also feels thinner than my other Fossil Jacqueline watches, almost like it's not made of real leather, even though it is stamped inside. But maybe I'm wrong... still. The rose gold also isn't as soft as is it in the photos, it looks a little closer to bronze.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Its a BLACK dial not BLUE
customer_reviews.text: The reason my wife selected this watch was the BLUE Dial. The product we got has the same model number and all but the dial on looks black in any light (white, yellow and even sunlight). NOT BLUE as shown in the image at all. I am returning it. To return it for the seller's mistake, I have to pay shipping!!!. Will avoid buying on Amazon. No safety for buyer's value !!!
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the band
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch!! I have close to a dozen Fossil watches and love them all but this one has to be my new front-runner. The face is beautiful and simple. That said...my only gripe is that the band feels like it will get loose pretty quickly AND yesterday I got a few drops of water on the band....and now it's slightly discolored. But since Fossil is having a great sale, I picked up a replacement band for a great deal and problem solved. 😃👍
customer_reviews.author: Raven P.

customer_reviews.title: Band turns dark grey
customer_reviews.text: The reviews about the band turning black are so right :( I was really hoping that because it isn't a cheap watch it would stay looking nice but it didn't. I still wear it because it keeps time and the face looks good, but the pink leather band turned dark grey within a week. I don't even wear long sleeves or anything that should do that! It just soaks up color I guess. Be prepared to have a dark greyish dirty band with a pretty face.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Never buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift for my brothers wedding(for his wife). It arrived 10 days later then initial delivery date. So I had to fo to the wedding with no gift. What an embarrassment! I called amazon regarding this and they offered me $10 giftcard bonus as a COMPENSATION. I was speechless when customer care lady told me that it was to compensate for the loss. As if my loss can be compensated with a $10 gift card. I wanted to talk to her supervisor but she very technically declined. Buy watch from somewhere elese.
customer_reviews.author: Md Muktadir Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: This watch is so cute , classy and affordable, I received it in good condition kept in a box that I can re-use to store the watch , thinking of buying fossil watch belts so I can switch them around . This watch is simple and classic . Go for it#happycustomer
customer_reviews.author: Rowean

customer_reviews.title: the face is the perfect size and the leather color is exactly how I ...
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed, the face is the perfect size and the leather color is exactly how I was hoping it's be. Two of my girlfriends went and ordered this watch after :)
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn E.

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this watch for about 6 weeks now... it is a beautiful watch! I absolutely love the size, I was concerned it may be too large, but I really like it! The face is gorgeous and easy to read. The strap is light, so it shows wear, but in my opinion does not take away from the overall aesthetic of the watch. Easy to set and great price! I’m incredibly pleased with this buy!
customer_reviews.author: VHerrizzle

customer_reviews.title: it looks great! She appreciates that the face is flat so ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves everything about it. First, it looks great! She appreciates that the face is flat so it doesn’t knock against things as easily as her former watch; and the she likes the smooth leather band that feels luxurious. Great watch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MBG

customer_reviews.title: So pretty, just love it!
customer_reviews.text: The watch came quickly and it's exactly how described and pictured. Very pretty and comfortable to wear. I really wanted a navy blue watch and this one is perfect. Also, Fossil makes a great quality watch every time. No worries about that part...you know if it's Fossil it's good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: This was and has been the only product that I have ever ordered from Amazon that was anything but satisfactory. It is so cheaply made, the leather loop that holds the band ripped the second time I wore it. I was so dissatisfied and I lost money buying this watch online. I have several Fossil products and I have never had any issues as I did with this one. Very dissatisfied customer. I’m sorry but if I could give zero stars I would. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and effortless, as always
customer_reviews.text: I own many Fossil watches and I've been very satisfied with their products over the years. They age well, leather straps have not cracked and they are beautiful, quality timepieces. This is no different.
customer_reviews.author: Jes Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect timing
customer_reviews.text: I love this style. Had one just like it from TJ Max with a light colored band. The navy looks great with the rose gold. I like a non metal, not-too-thick band with a big watch face. This Fossil watch is perfection, and it keeps time!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Buffington

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite watch. Perfect shade of rose gold and the leather band is soft. I originally got this same watch a few years ago. The battery died and so my sweet husband tried to replace it for me (nightmare to do), in the process he ended up cracking the glass! So I ordered this one to replace my original. Perfect watch, so cute, just take it to a watch pro to change the battery.
customer_reviews.author: CJBenz

customer_reviews.title: Nice nurses watch
customer_reviews.text: Excellant gift to my nursing student daughter. Easy for her to use and looks great on her.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and simple. Great everyday watch!
customer_reviews.text: As described. Looks just like the photo. I love that it's low profile and has the date on the face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Very pretty watch
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for Christmas. Took a risk because she’s not too much into watches. However, she genuinely loves it. She wears it fairly frequently. And she has received numerous complements on it. It has also held up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: I love this. My only complaint would be difficulty finding ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. My only complaint would be difficulty finding any bracelet to wear with it since it's a tone between gold and rose gold, but that really has nothing to do with the product. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian R

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this watch in June. In August the second ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this watch in June. In August the second hand broke off and is now loose. Aside from the fact that the hand just broke off, the other two hands no longer work. I only wore this watch to work and took care to store it safely. The return window has closed so I'm not able to return to the seller. I will not be ordering this watch it from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: RBE

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandmother. She can easily read the time and it looks very nice on her. She likes it and wears it every day
customer_reviews.author: Nursemom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great value
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I love watches so when I went to visit her last month, I decided to surprise her with this Fossil watch. I've had Fossil in the past and they were usually decent quality, affordable and this is no exception. I wasn't sure what to expect and was pleasantly surprised. The case has a great weight and quality to it, similar to my Citizen. The leather band is really nice, soft leather. I like, too, that it can be dressed up or down and has a very classic look that won't become dated quickly. In short, great watch, great value. I'm really impressed!
customer_reviews.author: MN22

customer_reviews.title: Love it! But gets dirty fast
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. Elegant, feminine, stylish - the only reason I don't give it 5-stars is because the leather got dirty really fast and I'm not even sure if it's something I can clean off.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Yusupova

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful watch. 36in
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful watch. 36in. Fits just right on my wrist which is about 61/2 inches. I have to use the last hole in the band. Roman numerals are more attractive looking than plain numbers. It's easy to read the time it's not too big and not bulky. Good for casual and dress. VERY pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read, thin, silent, attractive
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several different watches for my daughter to try and this was her favorite. She likes the larger "boyfriend" size even though she is petite. The bezel is nice and thin and the ticking noise is inaudible, unlike Timex watches. I was hoping to find a watch with a light-up face or at least luminescent hands, but my daughter uses her phone by her bedside anyway so it doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: rgonzale

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and prefect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same watch about five years ago and the band recently broke. I put off getting a new band and when I finally broke down I realized that this same watch was still available but with a more rose gold watch face. I loved my old watch and I REALLY love my new watch. Definitely the deal of the day on black Friday for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P

customer_reviews.title: W O W Z A
customer_reviews.text: gorgeous watch; love the light cream colored band and the silver (great combo). Lightweight and easy to wear and easy to see, of course. Can't even tell I have it on. Classic design and rich looking. I have a tiny wrist and there's enough holes for me to adjust it to the right size. Fossil - you knocked this one out of the ballpark.
customer_reviews.author: lemoncrush

customer_reviews.title: NOT a Grey Band
customer_reviews.text: Definitely NOT a gray band. The video is the most accurate depiction of the watch. It's straight dark brown (like an espresso color). The face is more of a gold than rose gold, in my opinion. I do like the femininity of the watch and it is lightweight. The face is not too big. I will likely keep the watch, but definitely wish it was more grey than brown.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Drake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect everyday kind of watch
customer_reviews.text: Perfect everyday kind of watch. Slim face and comfortable leather band make me forget I'm even wearing it half of the time. Neutral Band goes great with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: That the numbers on the watch are easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the numbers on the watch are big and I like the blue color of the second hand.. I would have liked the watch band to have been a little bit bigger. I will be wearing my watch to work.
customer_reviews.author: heidi scarletta

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is lovely watch, Fossil never lets me down. The only problem you should consider is the banda material and color is very likeñy to get dirty the first 2 pictures were taken as soon as I received the product, the last one is after 3 days of use
customer_reviews.author: Maria Jose Vega

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I needed a watch fast for work and was a little wary about ordering one off Amazon. This is actually a really nice watch for the price. The band is a silver that can be worn with both khaki; black and grey
customer_reviews.author: SR3030

customer_reviews.title: Like the watch very much
customer_reviews.text: Like the watch very much. Only have had it for a few days so I cannot attest to its longevity. Be aware that the VI time is upside down.. I like that it has a long strap but unfortunately I am between holes and am afraid to have another hole punched in. Not much space between them. All in all, I like the look of it and have high hopes it will last a while..
customer_reviews.author: Margo Star

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Easy to adjust the time. Has a date window but its very small...is why i took one star off. The band is so soft and comfortable. Looks well made. I hope it lasts a long time
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Expensive mistake to purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this watch since late August and the date function has stopped working and the watch does not keep time appropriately, even with battery replacement. Expensive mistake to purchase, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: heyfalski

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch. It exceeds my expectations and is lovely. The face is high quality and the band is genuine leather. I'm so glad I ordered this.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. U

customer_reviews.title: VERY, VERY LIGHT COLOR BAND
customer_reviews.text: I could have loved this watch, but being very fair skinned, it basically disappeared into my arm color. I am exchanging it for the black model. Loved everything about it but the non-color.
customer_reviews.author: KF, Charlotte, NC

customer_reviews.title: Classic, high quality timepiece- looks great for everything!
customer_reviews.text: It is a classic timepiece. The time is easy to read and I have a preference for roman numerals. I wear it to do everything, so it’s pretty tough. I garden and run around and clean and shower with it, dishes, hit with the hose, submerged in buckets, no problems. I just forgot to take it off most of the time. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: OliverlovesEmily

customer_reviews.title: New favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. It look classy yet functional, and for the price I can’t really ask for a better watch. I can see myself wearing it for long.
customer_reviews.author: JessJulio

customer_reviews.title: Quality Watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. Easy to read and very stylish. I’ve had it since December and worn it to work often and it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I wanted a large watch face but not anything bulky, and this was the perfect choice! It feels great on my wrist and is easy to read. A great everyday watch!
customer_reviews.author: grandma9times

customer_reviews.title: Be careful.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the watch, but, because of the face coloring, the date is difficult to read. A plain face is strongly recommended if you want to read the date.
customer_reviews.author: Jaqui A. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Attractive classy style
customer_reviews.text: This watch is even prettier than the photo. The face is just the right side for my wrist, the design on the face is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gife for a woman
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this watch for my wife and she loves it... but really loves it. It looks very well made and durable, just like any other fossil watch, awesome brand. It's a little watch very refined. If your wife or girlfriend wants a watch don't think twice and buy this one, you wont regreat it.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Conde

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch, great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my girlfriend, she loved it. Looks great on wrist. We're not together anymore so it might not be great enough to save your relationship, but would recommend nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Watch beautiful but bracelet not
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful! But you have to be careful if you choose white or beige like the colour of the bracelet because I bought it in beige and after 1 month it was already dirty and there is no chance to “clean” it. So I had to buy another one...
customer_reviews.author: Wascar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wore this watch two times and the band is stained already. I am not careless with my things and have NEVER had this happen. SO disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great face, strap will get dirty
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek and unique. The face is gorgeous. Only thing wrong is I can already start to see that the light colored strap will get dirty quickly. I've worn it a few times and it is already starting to look discolored. Will probably order a darker colored strap.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife as an anniversary present and she rates it 5 stars! It is a very nice watch of good quality and great looks. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gpears

customer_reviews.title: Improve your packing.
customer_reviews.text: box was totally opened..every part was outside . Customer pay for items... so you need to be improve how to do proper packing. Thank god my watch is safe. But i dont like it...
customer_reviews.author: ketul

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dial, horrible strap.
customer_reviews.text: This watch was beautiful, I really loved it. The watch strap, however is a different matter. I wore it one time for a regular work day, and it turned so ugly. I really loved the watch, I wish they'd just sell it with a different leather strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch and big
customer_reviews.text: I'm very petite and this watch is too big - the band, even with all the holes, is too big. The face of the watch is very large too, at least on me. I like it, I'm keeping it, but it's a biggie!
customer_reviews.author: Bikerbird

customer_reviews.title: Simple, elegant watch
customer_reviews.text: It is a good, everyday wear watch.. can be worn on professional attire too. The quality of the watch band is good too. Soft leather texture. Overall worth the price. Compare the prices on the fossil website.
customer_reviews.author: abby06

customer_reviews.title: It's very pretty and the quality is great
customer_reviews.text: This photos online don't do this watch justice. It's very pretty and the quality is great. It looks chic next to a few other pieces of arm candy. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Yaz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and of good quality
customer_reviews.text: This watch was a gift for my mum and she loved the color and the design of it. The quality of the watch was great!
customer_reviews.author: Ukba Amin

customer_reviews.title: Watch band quickly gets dirty
customer_reviews.text: After wearing the watch for two days, the band is already very dirty. I should have listened to the other reviewers and gotten some leather protectant on it to try to avoid the situation. This is the first Fossil product I have ever purchased, and I used to associate the brand with quality, but I'm doubtful now. The timepiece is pretty. The band, however, keeps it from being a product I would recommend to anyone. You shouldn't have to worry about cleaning or replacing your watch band three days after you start wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the watch
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch!! Its very lightweight and a great size. The color is very similar to the picture, too. The only issue I had was that it came with a dead battery. I can easily pop over to the jewelry store, or even Walmart, and get it changed out, but it would have been nice had it been ready to wear upon opening it. Other than that, it was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie G.

customer_reviews.title: I have had it for a few months and it has worked great. Not scratches to the glass yet
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with this watch. I have had it for a few months and it has worked great. Not scratches to the glass yet. You can hear the ticking of the clock hands and it feels cheaply made but it has lasted with light use for several months so far.
customer_reviews.author: Carter Smith

customer_reviews.title: The watch is fine. I like the color of the band
customer_reviews.text: The watch is fine. I like the color of the band, but was a disappointed in the coloring of the face of the watch. Mine looks just plain white and not that pretty pearly mixture of colors which is why I bought the watch to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: JAW

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable and defective
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed because this watch turned out to be super unreliable and very sporadic when it comes to working and not working. The watch will stop and start at random times during the day. I've had it for less than a week now, so the battery should be just fine. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.text: The face and band were bigger than I expected. Everything else was great!!
customer_reviews.author: kamara B.

customer_reviews.title: I like it. I saw people said the date on ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I saw people said the date on the watch is not working when they receive it. I think the date can be adjusted just like the time. You just google how to adjust the date and time of a watch then you can learn it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Day nenevnenevenenevnenever changes, the time slows down. I gave to adjust the time and dateevery single day. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: Fossil is a great brand. I bought it for my sister, she really loved it
customer_reviews.author: Yugen-

customer_reviews.title: Elegant watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch is perfect to gift someone, I have bought it to gift one of my friend. And I can definitely say that she wil like it. The gauge is not that big and looks perfect and elegant on the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kaushik Panchal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, high quality watch!
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan of Fossil's products, and this watch is no exception. Pros: Can dress it up or down, this is really a wear-anywhere watch. Perfect sized face. Strap is high quality leather and very comfortable. The warranty is phenomenal: 11 years! Cons: None!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFam

customer_reviews.title: Nothing bad to say about a fossil watch!! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love fossil watches, this one did not disappoint. It looks simple and classy which is exactly what I was going for.
customer_reviews.author: LJTaylor

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: got this watch for my wife. she loved it... great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Eli Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Darn!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give ZERO stars. Watch box was open, and watch wasn’t even in the box. Next, the seconds hand is BROKEN right away. Will be sending back. Sad I paid for one day shipping.
customer_reviews.author: hallie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, comfortable watch. Love Fossil watches. I have 5 and ordered 2 for my son. He really likes his also. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gourdbeader1

customer_reviews.title: Did Not order this watch.
customer_reviews.text: I did Not order this watch. I put 3 watches in my cart. I usually put several items of one kind in my cart and then come back & select the one I want. If I had ordered this I would have changed the mailing address & payment options! Good thing you didn't send me all 3!!!7
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Pretty watch, but I use the second to smallest ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty watch, but I use the second to smallest hole. I dont even have a small wrist, so I think the measurements are off compared to normal watches.
customer_reviews.author: Amaze Me

customer_reviews.title: This watch has a nice band and the face of the watch is a ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Fossil watches to start. This watch has a nice band and the face of the watch is a great size. It is easy to set for time and date. Great for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I was going to return it because it was a bit expensive, but I got it and fell in love and I just had to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: hayley

customer_reviews.title: The Watch is amazing, but the iron box is not as great.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. It seems to be a perfect gift to my wife. The material and quality is great for such a price. I expected it to be just a bit heavier but it's still great quality. It comes with an iron box to keep the watch safe, that I think can be done a bit better, that is why it has a four rating. Again the watch is awesome and super! nothing wrong with it!
customer_reviews.author: Basil Mohammad

customer_reviews.title: Highly rated product that is very attractive.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my Wife who is very particular about the watches she has owned over the years. She loves it! The watch came very nicely packaged. It was delivered quickly. I stuck a bow on the top and gave it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lott

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch for such an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and elegant watch. Love the navy blue band and the rose gold bezel.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy2PatOona

customer_reviews.title: Perfect everyday watch!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect everyday watch! I wanted something less expensive with an attractive appearance and this is exactly that. It’s great for work and causal attire. Very easy to read. Not too big/small.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rupp

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I wear t every day and sometimes I accidentally hit it on walls but it’s pretty durable so you can’t even tell!
customer_reviews.author: Megan L.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: As a gift to my wife on her birthday, she loves it
customer_reviews.author: edfloartstrkes

customer_reviews.title: it's looks great, I've had fossil before
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a xmas gift, it's looks great , I've had fossil before, there good watches so I don't expect any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Band Turned Black
customer_reviews.text: The watch arrived and looked beautiful. However, after just HALF A DAY of wearing it, the band began to turn black. I'm not a dirty person and there's no reason for the watch to be looking like this after I wore it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: ... than it appears in this photo but looks so good on. Very cute paired with gold Ronaldo bracelets
customer_reviews.text: The band is slimmer than it appears in this photo but looks so good on. Very cute paired with gold Ronaldo bracelets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100% FAKE
customer_reviews.text: A 100% fake watch. It came apart the 2nd day I had it. I thought I did something wrong, but when I took it to an expert, they scolded me for spending money on a fake one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the style of this watch, I looked at several and the camel colored band with the navy face and rose gold markers is so lovely. Word to the wise, make sure that you keep an eye on the date setting. Mine sometimes needs to be moved manually.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Cosgrove

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I like the easy to see face. Important to me as a professional nurse. This is my second Fossil. I wanted a second only only because the first was gold tone and I also wanted a silver one.
customer_reviews.author: Pambeela

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. The tin box it came in was a little dented but the watch itself was fine. Love the colors and I like how the watch tells you what day of the month it is along with the time!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised. Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as advertised! Believe me, I did all the reading and comparisons before deciding to purchase this and I'm glad I did. If you want that Simple yet elegant, sophisticated look, buy this!!! I got it from the seller 6pm.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: A great classic
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch by Fossil. Great for casual wear and dressed up enough for those nicer occasions. I love that it has a small window for the day of the month.
customer_reviews.author: dlphillips

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Keeping Time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch because Fossil is a reputable manufacturer and I was looking for a watch that would last several years. It is a very pretty watch and I liked the appearance very much. However, in under 3 months, the watch stopped telling time correctly and I would need to reset the date and time frequently throughout the week. This is disappointing because it is such a nice looking watch and I expected so much more.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay clean :-(
customer_reviews.text: I love the simple, clean, look of this watch. The blush colored watchband also attracted me, however it was "dirty" looking after a couple days. The nubuck type material and the light color worked to make it look like it needed cleaning. Also, the watch is gaining time (not reliable). It is very disappointing because it is a great look.
customer_reviews.author: CQ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful watch! I have always loved Fossil. The band is a rich navy blue and the watch face is off-white with rose gold. It is very well made. The estimated delivery was 5 to 7 days but it was delivered in only 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Jess T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: wife loves this and she especially loves the strap as it's breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason
